Posts.EditableText: Hi all hope you are ok on this dry day. I have decided to come out of the dinosaur age and upgrade to 5.4. Most is working ok but I keep getting this error [color=#FF0000:2okhckyw][Error running script: Error evaluating expression 'result + GetDisplayNameLink(item, "exit", item.displayverbs)': Index was out of range. Must be non-negative and less than the size of the collection.Parameter name: index][/color:2okhckyw] on every location. I have uploaded the game for hopefully, someone to have a look at (please). Thanking you Terry Happy adventuring
Posts.HTML:

dark mirrors2.aslx

Posts.EditableText: You have imported core functions into your game (ShowRoomDescription, FormatExitList,...) so I think these core functions have changed in Q5.4 and now you must update them in your game.
Posts.HTML: You have imported core functions into your game (ShowRoomDescription, FormatExitList,...) so I think these core functions have changed in Q5.4 and now you must update them in your game.

Posts.EditableText: Ok thanks for looking I'll look into it Terry
Posts.HTML: Ok thanks for looking I'll look into it Terry

Posts.EditableText: Pertex thanks again I looked into it and deleted the [color=#FF0000:2gp0rvou][Format Exit List][/color:2gp0rvou] from the 5.4 version and all works again many thanks Terry.
Posts.HTML: Pertex thanks again I looked into it and deleted the [Format Exit List] from the 5.4 version and all works again many thanks Terry.
